participant_1.name: Linda
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, loves nature and enjoys spending time with family.
participant_1.background: I drive more than an hour each way to work. I am a grandparent at 44. I prefer the night to the day, but I love sunshine. I can never decide between a chili corn dog and a cheesy hot dog. I love dragons.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and adventurous, enjoys outdoor activities and has a playful sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I think Canadian women are incredibly attractive. I like hiking up volcanoes. I drive a Prius. I cannot get enough ginger snaps. Sometimes, I like to relieve myself when on roses.

content.text: Hey, I'm going to be hiking up a volcano in the next few weeks. Have you done any hikes like that before?
Yeah, I love hiking up volcanoes. I've done a few in Canada.
Cool! What's it like hiking up a volcano?
It's pretty challenging, but it's also really rewarding. You get to see some amazing views from the top.
I'm sure it is. I'm looking forward to it.
What volcano are you hiking?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still doing some research.
Well, if you need any help, let me know. I'd be happy to give you some tips.
Thanks, I appreciate it.
No problem.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go camping, hiking, and kayaking.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to do those things too.
Cool! Maybe we can go hiking together sometime.
That would be fun!
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Sounds good.
Hey, I know you said you like dragons. I just found this really cool dragon-shaped cookie cutter. Do you want it?
That's so nice of you! I love it!
You're welcome! I'm glad you like it.
Thank you so much! I'm going to put it on my fridge.
You're welcome! I'm glad you like it.
